ai-iti68:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti68:2.1_0: “Whoever has not given up greed, hate, and delusion
ai-iti68:2.2_0: is said to be trapped. They’re caught in Māra’s snare, and the Wicked One can do what he wants with them.
ai-iti68:2.3_0: Whoever has given up greed, hate, and delusion
ai-iti68:2.4_0: is said to be trapped. They’re caught in Māra’s snare, and the Wicked One cannot do what he wants with them.”
ai-iti68:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti68:3.1_0: “Those in whom greed, hate, and ignorance
ai-iti68:3.3_0: belong with those who have developed themselves;
ai-iti68:3.6_0: they’ve given up everything, they say.”
ai-iti68:4.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
